message:
Is there any alternative to : https://github.com/romannurik/MaterialColorsApp for Linux ?

this node.js desktop app is for mac only but it still cross platform app so i compiled it on [Manjaro Linux] which is based on [Arch Linux] , when the app starts "chrome developer options" opens also and i can't interact with the app.

my issue in the repo : https://github.com/romannurik/MaterialColorsApp/issues/20 if any one want to help :)
story: Mohamed Mostafa shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: romannurik/MaterialColorsApp
caption: github.com
description: MaterialColorsApp - A handy little Mac app that gives you quick access to the standard material design color palette.

data.message:
I created something like that about 6 month ago for windows & linux... here's the link: 
http://ahmed-badawy.com/projects/D-Faster/projects/-design/color-palettes/color-palettes2.html?cate=designer_links&key=3
